messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw:  Yahoo! mail and AOL :(
messages.msgSnippet: Well, this is truly strange. Now I am getting some mail from some yahoogroups lists -- see, unschooling is special!! I also went to the AOL help desk to see
messages.messageBody:
Well, this is truly strange.

Now I am getting some mail from some yahoogroups lists -- see, unschooling is
special!!

I also went to the AOL help desk to see what else they could tell me. They
said just now (Tuesday AM) that they are not blocking yahoogroups email lists
because of spam but that there is a "system difficulty" on AOL's side of
things due to "system upgrades and maintenance."

Now that's what I call spam! :)

Nance



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw:  Yahoo! mail and AOL :(
messages.msgSnippet: this is the first yahoo groups mail I ve received in days .... and I usually have to delete up to 100 emails per day and I m only getting the ones that have
messages.messageBody:
this is the first yahoo groups mail I've received in days .... and I usually
have to delete up to 100 emails per day and I'm only getting the ones that
have aol in the subjuect of the mail ....


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw:  Yahoo! mail and AOL :(
messages.msgSnippet: I have missed it all. I haven t been getting my e-mail for a different reason. I had a yahoo! account and didn t like the interface so I closed by groups and
messages.messageBody:
I have missed it all. I haven't been getting my e-mail for a different
reason. I had a yahoo! account and didn't like the interface so I closed by
groups and haven't logged in for a while. evidently i missed one group and
it started bouncing mail. Because it was linked to my home account, it also
bounced all that mail too. I thought it was exceptionally quiet for a few
weeks, then realized I had received nothing fron unschooling dotcom. I'm
glad to be back.
Johanna
Life is the ultimate learning experience!
----- Original Message -----
From: <unschoolr2@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, July 23, 2001 9:26 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: Yahoo! mail and AOL :(


> I am finally beginning to receive some ... it has been about 3 days. AOL
> blaming yahoo and yahoo blaming aol....hopefully they have it worked out.
> Teri

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw:  Yahoo! mail and AOL :(
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks, Lynda! This is the first unschooling-dotcom group mail I ve gotten in days. I wonder if AOL has a vanity filter that lets through messages with its
messages.messageBody:
Thanks, Lynda!

This is the first unschooling-dotcom group mail I've gotten in days. I wonder
if AOL has a vanity filter that lets through messages with its name in it.

:-) Diane

messages.subject: Fw:  Yahoo! mail and AOL :(
messages.msgSnippet: For those of you who have AOL and have been having problems getting mail from yahoogroups, this is the message that was sent to some yahoo list owners. Lynda
messages.messageBody:
For those of you who have AOL and have been having problems getting mail
from yahoogroups, this is the message that was sent to some yahoo list
owners.

Lynda
----- Original Message -----
> ====
> I'm sure that you have heard by now that AOL is not sending mail that
> comes from Yahoogroups. They consider Yahoogroups mail as being spam.
> Until this problem is solved, those who have AOL will not receive any
> mail from Yahoogroups. If you know anyone with an AOL address, please
> tell them why they are not receiving messages from any of their Yahoo!
> lists that they are on.
